name: Cookies TD: Idle Tower Defense
description:
Build towers to protect the secret recipe from the cookie enemy invasion!

• Endless idle gameplay
• Unlock wicked powerful towers
• Play offline with no internet connection
• Automatically progress while away from the game
• Crazy boss fights and wacky enemies
• Super cool worlds to explore
• 50+ supercharged upgrades

Please let us know any feedback in your App Store review - we read EVERY single review! :)
